positions.title: Senior Software Engineer
achievements: Led client communication and analyzed requirements for 10+ projects, resulting in a 95% on-time project completion rate.
Streamlined the software release process by implementing CI/CD pipelines (using tools like CircleCI/Docker), cutting deployment time by 50%.
Mentored and managed a team of 4 junior developers by conducting code reviews, which reduced production bugs by 30%

positions.title: Senior Software Engineer
achievements: Built and scaled RESTful APIs handling 10K+ requests per second using Node.js and Redis caching
Implemented automated CI/CD pipeline reducing deployment time from 2 hours to 15 minutes
Optimized database queries resulting in 45% improvement in application performance
Identified and documented 200+ critical bugs over 16 months, significantly improving the UX and stability of product releases.

positions.title: Project Manager and Team Lead
achievements: Served as the primary bridge between Product, Engineering, and Creative teams, ensuring effective collaboration and seamless execution of project goals.
Reviewed and validated code for functionality, accuracy, and compliance with project standards.
Developed and executed design, development, and release plans, ensuring timely and high-quality deliverables.

positions.title: Quality Assurance Tester
achievements: Designed and executed comprehensive test plans, scenarios, and test cases to ensure software functionality, performance, and reliability across multiple platforms.
Collaborated closely with developers and product managers to communicate test findings, provide actionable feedback, and enhance overall user experience (UX).
Verified and validated fixes, performing regression and exploratory testing to maintain product stability throughout release cycles.

positions.title: Full stack developer (Contractual)
achievements: Designed and developed responsive, high-performance web applications using PHP, MySQL, CodeIgniter, and WordPress, ensuring smooth functionality and scalability.
Translated PSD designs into pixel-perfect, responsive HTML/CSS layouts leveraging Bootstrap for modern UI/UX experiences.
Developed and integrated RESTful APIs to connect server-side logic with client-facing interfaces.
